item.title: Connecting
item.description: Set env var of Cluster name CLUSTER_NAME=k8s-workshop OPTIONAL if using gcloud console * Set up the gcloud sdk gcloud init Set gcloud project env var PROJECT_ID=${1:-k8s-workshop}; gcloud config set project ${PROJECT_ID}; gcloud config set compute/region us-east1; gcloud config set compute/zone us-east1-b; Check to make sure account can see gcloud container clusters list Get the cluster credentials gcloud container clusters get-credentials ${CLUSTER_NAME}; Make kubectl can see the cluster kubectl cluster-info Allow docker to push to GCR gcloud auth configure-docker The following settings will be added to your Docker config file located at [/Users/contino/.
